# Getting Started

Welcome to neurospatial! This section will help you get up and running quickly.

## What You'll Learn

- **[Installation](installation.md)**: How to install neurospatial and its dependencies
- **[Quickstart](quickstart.md)**: A 5-minute introduction with working examples
- **[Core Concepts](core-concepts.md)**: Understanding bins, connectivity graphs, and layout engines

## Prerequisites

neurospatial requires:

- Python 3.10 or higher
- Basic familiarity with NumPy and array operations
- Understanding of spatial coordinates (e.g., x, y positions)

## Next Steps

After completing the getting started guide, explore:

- **[User Guide](../user-guide/index.md)**: Deep dives into specific features
- **[API Reference](../api/index.md)**: Complete API documentation
- **[Examples](../examples/index.md)**: Real-world use cases and notebooks
